root: ^Now do you see how dangerous this place is? Are you sure you still want to continue?
^I'll keep on going. But only alone.
^Being alone out here is twice as dangerous.
^Being with you two is three times more dangerous.
^I get the hint. Go together if you want; I can go through the traps on my own just fine.
^We need to all go together. I'm sure each of us will be extremely cautious from now on.
^I'm confident you two would just keep solving riddles and telling old stories, but I have a different approach.
^I'm sure we can come to an agreement.
^When the trap is triggered, there will be no time to debate.
^Apparently every room has a riddle. It seems likely given what we've seen so far. We can win by playing by the rules.
^I'm not going to dance to somebody's ancient pipe. I'm going to go my own way.

c-0: ^Xenia, let's go together. Max, come with us.
^I've decided to go alone. When I find gold, I promise not to take all for myself; I'll leave something for you.
c-1: ^Max, I like your approach better, but I can't let Xenia go alone.
^Andreas, go with Max if you want. You don't have to babysit me. I still need to look at Parthenon and Knossos.
^Don't you want to know what secrets this maze is hiding? Oh — I bet you’re just going to pretend that you're leaving but will be following us instead.

^No, I'll just return when you leave. Hey! I’m just kidding! I'll just wait for the ferry and leave, I promise. But I have one condition. Andreas, promise to give me a call when you'll find this artifact of your dreams to tell me about it. Here is my number.
^I'll give you a call, I promise.
